---
sidebar_position: 10
title: "ðŸŸ¢ Email yozish"
---


# Email yozish

Email yozish ko'p vaqt talab qiladigan vazifa bo'lishi mumkin, ayniqsa avval sizga kelgan emailni o'qib chiqishingiz kerak bo'lsa. Ushbu bo'limda bugun kasal bo'lganingizni boshliqqa aytadigan oddiy emaildan tortib, murakkabroq emaillarigacha bo'lgan foydalanish holatlari ko'rib chiqiladi.

## Oddiy kasallik kuni uchun email

Tasavvur qiling, bir kuni kasal bo'lib uyg'onasiz va ishga bora olmaysiz (yoki shunchaki bormoqchi emassiz ðŸ˜ˆ). Mana, boshliqqa kasal bo'lganingizni aytadigan oddiy prompt.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJ0b3BQIjowLCJ0ZW1wZXJhdHVyZSI6MCwibWF4VG9rZW5zIjoyNTYsIm91dHB1dCI6IlRhcmppbWE6XG5cbk1hdnp1OiBJc2h4b25hZGEgZW1hc21hbiDigJQga2FzYWxtYW5cblxuSHVybWF0bGkgSmFob25naXIsXG5cblNpemdhIHNodW5pIG1h4oCZbHVtIHFpbG1vcWNoaW1hbmtpLCBidWd1biBrYXNhbGxpayBzYWJhYmxpIGlzaHhvbmFkYSBib%2BKAmGxhIG9sbWF5bWFuLiBCdSBob2xhdCBub3F1bGF5bGlrIHR1Z%2BKAmGRpcnNhLCB1enIgc2%2FigJhyYXltYW4uXG5cbkFodm9saW0gaGFxaWRhIHNpem5pIHhhYmFyZG9yIHFpbGliIGJvcmFtYW4gdmEgb%2BKAmHppbW5pIHlheHNoaXJvcSBoaXMgcWlsZ2FuaW0gemFob3RpIGlzaGdhIHFheXRhbWFuLlxuXG5UdXNodW5nYW5pbmdpeiB1Y2h1biByYWhtYXQuXG5cbkh1cm1hdCBiaWxhbixcbk11cm9kIiwicHJvbXB0IjoiVGFyamltYTpcblxuTWVuaW5nIGlzbWltOiBNdXJvZFxuUmFoYmFyaW1uaW5nIGlzbWk6IEphaG9uZ2lyXG5cblJhaGJhcmltZ2EgYnVndW4ga2FzYWwgYm%2FigJhsZ2FuaW0gc2FiYWJsaSBpc2h4b25hZGEgYm%2FigJhsbWFzbGlnaW0gaGFxaWRhIGVsZWt0cm9uIHhhdCB5b3ppbmcuXG5cbkVsZWt0cm9uIHhhdCAodGFyamltYSk6XG5cbkh1cm1hdGxpIEphaG9uZ2lyLFxuXG5TaXpnYSBzaHVuaSBtYeKAmWx1bSBxaWxtb3FjaGltYW5raSwgYnVndW4gb%2BKAmHppbW5pIHlvbW9uIGhpcyBxaWxheW90Z2FuaW0gc2FiYWJsaSBpc2h4b25hZGEgYm%2FigJhsYSBvbG1heW1hbi4gSWx0aW1vcywgYnVuaW5nIHVjaHVuIHV6ciBxYWJ1bCBxaWxpbmcuXG5cbkh1cm1hdCBiaWxhbixcbk11cm9kIiwibW9kZWwiOiJ0ZXh0LWRhdmluY2ktMDAzIn0%3D"

Bu email ishlaydi, lekin juda zerikarli. Keling, uni biroz qiziqarliroq qilamiz!

## Uslub modifikatorlari/ko'rsatmalar

Email uslubini o'zgartirish juda oson. Masalan, siz AI'dan 'hazilomuz' bo'lishini so'rashingiz yoki unga 'Qiziqarli sabab kiriting' deb ko'rsatma berishingiz mumkin.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJ0b3BQIjowLCJ0ZW1wZXJhdHVyZSI6MCwibWF4VG9rZW5zIjoyNTYsIm91dHB1dCI6Ikh1cm1hdGxpIEphaG9uZ2lyLFxuXG5CdWd1biBpc2h4b25hZGEgYm%2FigJhsbWFzbGlnaW1uaSBtYeKAmWx1bSBxaWxpc2ggdWNodW4geW96eWFwbWFuLiBCaWxhbWFuLCBpc2hsYXNoaW0ga2VyYWsgZWRpLCBhbW1vIG1haGFsbGl5IHBvbmNoaWsgZG%2FigJhrb25pbmluZyDigJxzaXJlbmEgcW%%2BKAmGxnYW5pbSBzYWJhYmxpIGlzaHhvbmFkYSBib%2BKAmGxtYXNsaWdpbSBoYXFpZGEgaGF6aWwgYXJhbGFzaCwgYW1tbyBwcm9mZXNzaW9uYWwgdXNsdWJkYSBlbGVrdHJvbiB4YXQgeW96aW5nLlxuUWlzcWEgdmEga3VsZ2lsaSBib%2BKAmGxzaW4uIFFpemlxYXJsaSBzYWJhYiBoYW0ga2lyaXRpbmcuIiwibW9kZWwiOiJ0ZXh0LWRhdmluY2ktMDAzIn0%3D"

Mana yana bir jiddiyroq/professional misol.

## Emailga javob yozish

Tasavvur qiling, boshlig'ingizdan ko'p ma'lumotli uzun email oldingiz. Siz emailga javob yozishingiz kerak, lekin butun matnni o'qishga vaqtingiz yo'q. Siz emailni AI'ga yuborib, undan `Buning qisqacha mazmuni va bajarilishi kerak bo'lgan harakatlar ro'yxatini tuzib bering` deb so'rashingiz mumkin.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?config=eyJ0b3BQIjowLCJ0ZW1wZXJhdHVyZSI6MCwibWF4VG9rZW5zIjoyNTYsIm91dHB1dCI6IlFpc3FhY2hhIG1hem11bjpcbkphaG9uZ2lyIE11cm9kZGFuIHUgaXNobGF5b3RnYW4gZGFzdHVyaXkgdGHigJltaW5vdGRhZ2kgZm95ZGFsYW51dmNoaSBpbnRlcmZleXNpIChVSSkgYmlsYW4gYm9n4oCYbGlxIG11YW1tb2xhcm5pIGhhbCBldGlzaGRhIHlvcmRhbSBzb%2BKAmHJhbW9xZGEuIE11YW1tb2xhciBheXJpbSBmdW5rc2l5YWxhcmdhIGtpcmlzaCBxaXlpbmxpZ2kgdmEgaW50ZXJmZXlzbmluZyB5ZXRhcmxpY2hhIGludHVpdGl2IGVtYXNsaWdpIGJpbGFuIGJvZ%2BKAmGxpcS4gTXVyb2RuaW5nIGRhc3R1cml5IHRh4oCZbWlub3QgaXNobGFiIGNoaXFpc2ggYm%2FigJh5aWNoYSB0YWpyaWJhc2kgdmEgdXNoYnUgZGFzdHVyIGJpbGFuIHlheHNoaSB0YW5pc2hsaWdpIHVuaSBidSB2YXppZmEgdWNodW4gZW5nIG1vcyBzaGF4c2dhIGF5bGFudGlyYWRpLlxuXG5CYWphcmlsaXNoaSBrZXJhayBib%2BKAmGxnYW4gaXNobGFyOlxuXG5VSSBuaW5nIGpveWxhc2h1dmksIGRpemF5bmkgeW9raSBmdW5rc2lvbmFsbGlnaWdhIG%2FigJh6Z2FydGlyaXNobGFyIGtpcml0aXNoXG5cblphcnVyIGJv4oCYbHNhLCBxb%%%2FigJh6IGljaGlnYSBvbGlzaGkgbXVta2luLiBEYXN0dXJpeSB0YeKAmW1pbm90IGlzaGxhYiBjaGlxaXNoIGJv4oCYeWljaGEgdGFqcmliYW5naXogdmEgbWF6a3VyIGRhc3R1ciBiaWxhbiB5YXhzaGkgdGFuaXNobGlnaW5naXogc2l6bmkgYnUgdmF6aWZhIHVjaHVuIGVuZyBtb3Mgbm9tem9kIGRlYiBoaXNvYmxhc2hpbWl6Z2Egc2FiYWIgYm%2FigJhsbW9xZGEuXG5cbkFnYXIgdXNoYnUgdmF6aWZhbmkgYmFqYXJpc2ggdWNodW4gcW%2FigJhzaGltY2hhIHJlc3Vyc2xhciB5b2tpIHlvcmRhbSBrZXJhayBib%2BKAmGxzYSwgaWx0aW1vcywgbWVuZ2EgeGFiYXIgYmVyaW5nLiBTaHVuaW5nZGVrLCBraXJpdGlsYWRpZ2FuIG%2FigJh6Z2FydGlyaXNobGFyIHFhY2hvbiB5YWt1bmxhbmlzaGluaSB0YXhtaW5peSB2YXF0IGphZHZhbGkgYmlsYW4gYm%2FigJhsaXNoc2FuZ2l6LCBtaW5uYXRkb3IgYm%2FigJhsYXJkaW0uXG5cbkFnYXIgc2F2b2xsYXJpbmdpeiBib%2BKAmGxzYSB5b2tpIHFv4oCYc2hpbWNoYSB0dXNodW50aXJpc2gga2VyYWsgYm%2FigJhsc2EsIGJlbWFsb2wgbWVuZ2EgbXVyb2phYXQgcWlsaW5nLlxuXG5Lb21wYW5peWFtaXogdWNodW4gcWlsYXlvdGdhbiBtZWhuYXRpbmdpeiB2YSBmaWRveWlsaWdpbmdpeiB1Y2h1biByYWhtYXQuIFlhcWluIG9yYWRhIGphdm9iaW5naXpuaSBrdXRhbWFuLlxuXG5IdXJtYXQgYmlsYW4sXG5KYWhvbmdpciIsIm1vZGVsIjoidGV4dC1kYXZpbmNpLTAwMyJ9"

Keyin ushbu qisqacha mazmundan javob emailini yozishda foydalanishingiz mumkin.

<br />
E'tibor bering, ko'pincha bu ikki bosqichni bitta bosqichga birlashtirish mumkin. Siz AI'dan quyidagilarni yaratishni so'rashingiz mumkin
qabul qilgan emailingizdan to'g'ridan-to'g'ri javob emailini.

## Cold emaillar

Cold emaillar â€” bu siz tanimaydigan odamlarga yuboriladigan emaillar. Cold emaillarga javob olish qiyin, shuning uchun shaxsiylashtirilgan ko'plab emaillar yuborish foydali bo'lishi mumkin. Keling, buni GPT-3 yordamida qanday qilishni ko'rib chiqamiz (@bonta2022how).

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%2BKAmGxpc2hnYSB5b3JkYW0gYmVyYWRpZ2FuIHphbW9uYXZpeSBDUk0gdGl6aW1pZGlyLlxuXG5OaWdodGZhbGwgYXZ0b21hdGxhc2h0aXJpbGdhbiBtaWpvemxhcm5pIHNlZ21lbnRhdHNpeWFsYXNoLCBzaGF4c2l5bGFzaHRpcmlsZ2FuIG1pam96IHlv4oCYbGxhcmkgdmEgcmVhbCB2YXF0IHJlamltaWRhZ2kgdGFobGlsbGFyIGthYmkga2%2FigJhwbGFiIGZ1bmtzaXlhbGFybmkgdGFrbGlmIGV0YWRpLiBTaHVuaW5nZGVrLCBtYWhzdWxvdGltaXpkYW4gbWFrc2ltYWwgZGFyYWphZGEgZm95ZGFsYW5pc2hpbmdpeiB1Y2h1biAyNC83IG1pam96bGFybmkgcW%2FigJhsbGFiLXF1dnZhdGxhc2ggeGl6bWF0aW5pIGhhbSB0YXFkaW0gZXRhbWl6LlxuXG5OaWdodGZhbGwgYml6bmVzaW5naXogb%2BKAmHNpc2hpZ2EgcWFuZGF5IHlvcmRhbSBiZXJpc2hpIG11bWtpbmxpZ2kgaGFxaWRhIHN1aGJhdGxhc2hpc2huaSBpc3RhcmRpbS4gU2h1IGhhZnRhIHFpc3FhIHFv4oCYbmfigJhpcm9xIHVjaHVuIHZhcXRpbmdpeiBib%%2FigJhsc2luLiIsIm1vZGVsIjoidGV4dC1kYXZpbmNpLTAwMyJ9"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

Bu yaxshi, lekin bundan ham yaxshiroq qilishimiz mumkin. Keling, promptga yana biroz ma'lumot qo'shamiz.

### Tuzilmasiz ma'lumotlardan foydalanish

Aytaylik, emailingizni yuborayotgan odamning linkedin profiliga egasiz. Siz ushbu ma'lumotni promptga qo'shib, emailingizni yanada shaxsiylashtirishingiz mumkin. Misol sifatida [Strive asoschisining LinkedIn profilidan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/snpranav/) foydalanamiz. Uning profilidan bir qancha ma'lumotlarni ko'chirib olib, promptga qo'shamiz.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%2BKAmHlpY2hhIGRpcmVrdG9yIHNpZmF0aWRhLCBtaWpvemxhciBiaWxhbiBtdW5vc2FiYXRsYXJuaSBzYW1hcmFsaSBib3NocWFyaXNoIHVjaHVuIGlzaG9uY2hsaSBDUk0gcWFuY2hhbGlrIG11aGltIGVrYW5pbmkgeWF4c2hpIHR1c2h1bmlzaGluZ2l6Z2EgaXNob25hbWFuLlxuXG5OaWdodGZhbGwg4oCUIGJ1IG5lby1DUk0gYm%%2BKAmGxzYSwgYmF0YWZzaWwgbXVob2thbWEgcWlsaXNoIHVjaHVuIHFpc3FhIHFv4oCYbmfigJhpcm9xIGJlbGdpbGFzaGRhbiBtYW1udW4gYm%%2FigJhsaWIgb%2BKAmHRnYW4gSGFzaGlDb3Jw4oCZbmluZyB5aWxsaWsga29uZmVyZW5zaXlhc2kg4oCUIEhhc2hpQ29uZiAyMDIy4oCZZGEg4oCcU2VjdXJpbmcgQW55IERhdGEgU291cmNl4oCdIG1hdnp1c2lkYSBtYeKAmXJ1emEgcWlsZGkuXG5Lb%2BKAmG5pa21hbGFyOiBERVMgKE1h4oCZbHVtb3RsYXJuaSBzaGlmcmxhc2ggc3RhbmRhcnRpKSwgS3JpcHRvZ3JhZml5YSwgS2liZXJ4YXZmc2l6bGlrLCBLb250ZW50IHlhcmF0aXNoLCBBenVyZSBLdWJlcm5ldGVzIFNlcnZpY2UgKEFLUyksIEdvb2dsZSBLdWJlcm5ldGVzIEVuZ2luZSAoR0tFKVxuXG5TdGFydHVwIFNoZWxsXG5Bc29zY2hpbGFyIHJlc3Vyc2xhcmkgYm%2FigJh5aWNoYSBkaXJla3RvclxuMjAyMi15aWwgZmV2cmFsIOKAlCBob3ppcmdhY2hhICgxIHlpbCAyIG95KVxuQ29sbGVnZSBQYXJrLCBNYXJ5bGFuZCwgQVFTaFxuXG5WZXJjZWwsIE1vbmdvREIga2FiaSB0ZXhub2xvZ2lrIGtvbXBhbml5YWxhciBiaWxhbiBhc29zY2hpbGFyIHJlc3Vyc2xhcmkgYm%2FigJh5aWNoYSBoYW1rb3JsaWtsYXJuaSB5b3BkaS5cblxuMyBveSBpY2hpZGEgU3RhcnR1cCBTaGVsbOKAmWRhZ2kgYXNvc2NoaWxhciB1Y2h1biA1MCAwMDAgZG9sbGFyZGFuIG9ydGlxIGtyZWRpdGxhciB2YSByZXN1cnNsYXJuaSBqYWxiIHFpbGRpLlxuS2%%2FigJhsYW1kYSBib3NocWFyZGkgaGFtZGEgc2F2ZG8gdmEgbWFya2V0aW5nbmkgbmF6b3JhdCBxaWxkaS5cblxuMTAwWC5WQyB2YSBQZW9wbGUgR3JvdXAgYmlsYW4gbXV6b2thcmFsYXIgb2xpYiBib3JpYiwgU3RyaXZlIHVjaHVuIDUwIG1pbmcgZG9sbGFyIHNlZWQgaW52ZXN0aXRzaXlhIGphbGIgcWlsZGkuXG5Lb%%2BKAmHphbGxpZ2luaSBrb21weXV0ZXIgZmFubGFyaW5pbmcgYW1hbGl5b3RpIGJpbGFuIHV5Z%2BKAmHVuIG%%2FigJhsc2luLlxuTWFoc3Vsb3RuaSB0YWtsaWYgcWlsaXNoZGEgeXVxb3JpZGFnaSBMaW5rZWRJbiBtYeKAmWx1bW90bGFyaWRhbiB0ZWdpc2hsaSBqaWhhdGxhcm5pIGVzbGF0aWIgb%2BKAmHRpbmcuIiwibW9kZWwiOiJ0ZXh0LWRhdmluY2ktMDAzIn0%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

LLM'larning LinkedIn'dan ko'chirib olingan barcha ma'lumotlar ichidan asosiylarini ajratib bera olishi juda foydali. Ushbu cold outreach jarayonini LinkedIn'dan tegishli ma'lumotlarni yig'ish orqali kengroq miqyosda avtomatlashtirish ham mumkin.

## Xulosa

LLM'lar sizga email yozishda yordam bera oladi! Ularni yuborishdan oldin yozganlarini albatta o'qib chiqing ðŸ˜‰

## Batafsil

- [Zapier](https://zapier.com/blog/use-openai-gpt-3-to-write-emails/)
